examplePhrases: Show works by Vincent van Gogh
en-US.name: art gallery
en-US.description: Search artists names and their works.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
person: alexa open art gallery

alexa: Welcome to the Art gallery. You can ask a question like, name works by pierre auguste renoir or name artists like jackson... Whose works would you like to view?

person: name artists like rembr

alexa: rembrandt van rijn, rembrandt peale

person: name works by rembrandt van peale

alexa: I'm sorry, I currently do not know the work by rembrandt van peale. What else can I help with?

person: name works by rembrandt peale

alexa: A Roman Lady(Date unknown), Abigail Inskeep Bradford(1803-1808), Alida Livingston Armstrong and Daughter(circa 1810), Boy from the Taylor Family(circa 1812), Caroline Louisa Pratt Bartlett(1835-1836), Chancellor James Kent(1834-1835), Charles Hodge(Date unknown)...

person: stop

alexa: Goodbye!

person: name works by rembrandt van rijn

alexa: Sorry. Music and radio playback are not supported on this device.

person: alexa open art gallery

alexa: Welcome to the Art gallery. You can ask a question like, name works by pierre auguste renoir or name artists like jackson... Whose works would you like to view?

person: rembrandt van rijn

alexa: A Bald Man in Profile (The Artist's Father?)(1630), A Battle-Piece(circa 1641), A Beggar Sitting in an Elbow Chair(1630), A Beggar Sitting on a Hollock, with his Mouth Open(1630), A Beggar Standing and Leaning on a Stick(1632), A Beggar Standing, Seen in Profile to the Left(1630), A Beggar Warming his Hands over a Chafing Dish(1630), A Beggar with a Wooden Leg(1630)...
